/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. Trees line the street, their leaves rustling in the breeze, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. People can be seen walking on the sidewalks, going about their day, while cars are driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
